description:
Hiro is a former star student of the Mistilteinn academy, whose inability to pilot Franxx has left his hopes low, even to the point of choosing to leave Cerasus until his former partner http://anidb.net/ch93323 [Naomi] encourages him to stay. His emotions are strong, but his heart keeps him from giving up. His Franxx partner is http://anidb.net/ch92214 [Zero Two].
Source: Darling in the Franxx Wiki
name: Hiro
